text: Pol azenir rubuzir pumuningɨn dɨpenir mam ikia egha dɨpenir kam givesi. Ezɨ gumazamiziba an ganasa an dɨpenimɨn izima a bar akonge.(28:30) Luk azenir pumuning Pol batozir bizimɨn gun e mɨkemezir puvatɨ. Ezɨ gumazir maba ghaze, gavmanɨn gumaziba kalabusɨn a fɨrizɨ a ghua nguibar igharazibar Godɨn akam akuri. Ezɨ gumazir maba ghaze, Romɨn gavmanɨn gumaziba Pol mɨsoghezɨma an aremes.
